title: I have tried everything! League of Legends Log-in screen wont show up!
body:
A few days ago I tried opening League of Legends and when I clicked play on the launcher the log-in screen wouldn't show up. However, if I went and looked at my processes, all of the League of Legends processes would be up and running. Ever since then I have been looking all over on YouTube and the forums, but everything I have tried hasn't worked. 

Things I have tried-
-Deleting lol_air_client, running as admin and re-downloading files
-Deleting lol_air_client_config_na, running as admin and re-downloading files 
-Deleting lol_launcher, running as admin and re-downloading files 
-Deleting lol_patcher, running as admin and re-downloading files 
-Deleting all of the above, running as admin and re-downloading files
-Deleting all of the above+Solutions folder contents, running as admin and re-downloading files
-Re-installing League of Legends
-Cleaning Registry
-Using CCleaner to clean regularly
-Doing a Windows start-up repair
-Installing all of the latest drivers for my PC

All of these things I have tried have not worked and I just want to play League of Legends. Also, I don't believe it has anything to do with the age of my PC because I run league at over 100 FPS on High settings. Please Help!

replies.body: I wouldn't recommend deleting files as that can cause more issues than solve.  Your patcher is trying to access files and launch, but a setting in your OS might be blocking that from happening.  Running as administrator could be a quick workaround, but you may resolve this issue for good by following the instructions in our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide.  That should get you fixed up!

I did everything on this list and it worked for around 24 hours. I got on the next day and now its not loading the login screen again. I re-tried everything on the list including reinstalling it as admin and some of the things I tried before like cleaning the registry, but it didn't work this time.

Thanks for the update.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and we'll help with your specific issue individually.  You can also use the[ hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to automatically obtain some logs to provide more context.  We'll get you fixed up!
